overview: Audiovisual project carried out by SETAC's volunteers. Three intertwining stories: Martín, Damián's partner, who lives with HIV and because of prejudice and stigma has postponed a part of his story. Damián, on the other hand, is at a point where he will have to make a decision about letting go and moving on. And José, Damián's best friend, who will finally realize that he is not alone.
title: No estás solo
